title: Output tab-separated file
body:
The output of `consequence.py` in lookup mode should be consistent with _tsv_ files, generated by [23andme](http://23andme.com):

```
# rsid  chromosome  position    genotype
rs4477212   1   72017   AA
rs3094315   1   742429  AA
# ...
```

title: Lookup refSNP identifiers for SNPs in dbSNP
body: dbSNP is available in various formats on NCBI [FTP](ftp://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/snp/organisms/human_9606/VCF/v4.0/) server -- probably VCF would be the easiest to use.

title: Sane command line interface
body:
In fact, **any** cli will do, ex:

``` bash
$ consequence index path/to/vcf
$ consequence lookup --diploid path/to/bam
$ consequence partial --insert-size=1024 path/to/reference
```

All command should also take the following optional arguments:

``` bash
--index=path/to/index/dir    Path to directory with 'consequence' index files
--quiet                      Supress any output 'consequence' might generate
```

title: Vizualize evaluation results
body:
For each SNP **not** found by `consequence` :
- historgram of qualities 
- histrogram of bases
- coverage per each missed position

title: Improve filtering in 'naive_lookup'
body: Ideally, we shouldn't have false positives at all.
